channel.title: Help me Please
channel.description:
I have been away for the past 2 days now, when I came back-my account was changed a bit. My rep went from +8 to +2 and my signature went from "It was a link to how to get free PSPs" to "The one I have now". Im betting some other things have changed but I havnt noticed, I dont check my profile stuff often. In the news box (on the home page) is says something about accounts being deleted. Can anyone fill me in on whats happened in the past 2 days? Somone hacked the site? Please and Thank you.
-If this is in the wrong section (sorry), please move it.

item.title: Help me Please
item.dc:creator: @runescape192 runescape192
item.description:
@runescape192 wrote:

there was a problem and the website was down. the only way to fix it was to go to the last time he backed up this site which was like on the 15th

so any account after it were delted.

Read full topic
